meanings.definition: To treat or combine with tellurium.
meanings.sent1: The scientist was tellurizing the metal to create a new compound.
meanings.sent2: The jeweler was tellurizing the silver to enhance its properties.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally ended up tellurizing the sauce with a sprinkle of tellurium powder.
meanings.sent4: The artist's brush seemed to be tellurizing the canvas with magical colors.
meanings.sent5: The process of tellurizing the solution turned it into a vibrant hue.

meanings.sent1: The alchemist was tellurizing the elements to create a powerful potion.
meanings.sent2: The miner was tellurizing the ore to extract valuable minerals.
meanings.sent3: The magician's spell accidentally ended up tellurizing the rabbit into a telluride.
meanings.sent4: The sculptor's chisel seemed to be tellurizing the stone into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The process of tellurizing the metal turned it into a shiny telluride.

meanings.definition: To subject to the process of tellurization.
meanings.sent1: The factory was tellurizing the components to improve their conductivity.
meanings.sent2: The laboratory was tellurizing the samples to study their properties.
meanings.sent3: The prankster thought it would be funny to tellurize the water cooler at the office.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight seemed to be tellurizing the landscape with a golden hue.
meanings.sent5: The process of tellurizing the material made it more resistant to corrosion.
